text: Pibanga glabricula is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Bates in 1885. It is known from Costa Rica and Panama.BioLib.cz - Pibanga glabricula. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1885
title: Pibanga glabricula
